trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around December 7th 2010
Summary: the object flew over my house at a moderate speed with very little sound
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my front porch when i saw a huge star in the sky which i thought must be a planet because it was so bright . i didnt think much about it until i noticed that it was slowly moving towards me and thats when it got weird , i told myself that it must be a incomming flight , due to we have alot of jets in the area from miramar base . when it got close enough i knew it wasnt something that i have ever seen before, this craft was big and it only had a low hum comming from it . as it came over i yelled for my son to come see it, and he brought my binoculars so i could get a better look at it , boomerang shape ,three huge lights ,one on each tip and one on the front very big lights....... and it just cruised over my house ... when i couldnt see it anymore i went to the backyard so i would be able to watch some more , but it was gone , which is very strange because my backyard has a wide view of the sky ...i felt like i cought a ufo , top secret or extra terrestial not sure but very exiting!!
